--- rasmus4200 <jr@...> wrote:
> Has anyone on the group started writing code with junit and the 
> assert mechanism in jdk1.4?
> 
> When would you use an assert over a unit test?

Mu.

The question assumes the two are very similar, when in fact they are
nearly orthogonal. They do fit nicely together in various ways. My
favorite is to assert (the new keyword) what you assumed to be true
when writing your tests.

Search the list (and perhaps the extremeprogamming list as well) for
previous arguments#########discussions over this and other viewpoints.
I think about a year ago we had a long thread on one of the two groups.

Regards,

Rob
